sourcesContent:
import { Component } from '@angular/core'; import { AuthService } from '../auth/auth.service'; import { FormControl, Validators } from '@angular/forms'; @Component({ selector: 'app-register', templateUrl: './register.component.html', styleUrls: ['./register.component.scss'] }) export class RegisterComponent { email = new FormControl('',[Validators.required, Validators.email]); password = new FormControl('',[Validators.required]); hide = true; getErrorMessage() { if (this.email.hasError('required')) { return 'Заполните поле'; } return this.email.hasError('email') ? "Не верный формат" : ''; } constructor(private authSevice: AuthService) {} register(email: string, password: string) { this.authSevice.register(email, password); } }
